authors.name: Jacob Ryan

title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + IRE 2018 - Orlando
description: A group of investigative reporters share their tips for doing radio and podcast investigations, including recording action, revealing documents, and writing for the ear.
